title: Creating serious Team, Open to all Tier pref Gold+ but not essential read details
body:
hey guys here is the criteria this may come on a bit strong but is necessary: (ONLY FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE ARE AVAILABLE FROM 9.30PM TILL 2AM AEST WEEKDAYS AND FULL DAY WEEKENDS FOR TOURNAMENTS ) THATS 11.30PM TILL 4AM NZ TIME on weekdays (read all details)

-Firstly no raging of any kind whether towards team mates or enemy team eg, keyboard warrior and swearing etc
-Secondly communication, I require people that are talkative and know how to talk to other people this is not your gang this are people no offensive slang or swearing in communication (if you are quiet I apologise in advance)
-Thirdly I require independent souls eg capable of solo decision making that may very well be game breaking, However I do not require people who are silent and follow people around
-Fourthly should take every game seriously and have a must win attitude and always striving to improve.
-Most importantly you have maturity in matters regardless of age. ( This is a key factor you must have!!!)
-Gear wise decent enough to be able league at 60 and above fps as well as a stable internet connection.

I am looking for people wanting to improve and maybe even enter the competitive scene, this will be your right of path.

Trials open for any position, it will be first come first serve unless the person before you is unresponsive I will comment on this so be prepared or add me ign Wolves. (trials will start

If selected you will firstly require to disable cross team chat as no bming will be allowed (if we play in tournaments bming in some tournaments qualifies for instant disqualification)
Be able to use voice chat either skype or curse voice or ts etc
Be available for 4 or more practice sessions, missing sessions frequently is instant removal from team
Must have a positive attitude but we can work on that.
Be able to look up meta champs and learn them for team comps and what not, also champion pool must be extended to 5 comfortable champs on the given role.

Remember this is a serious team therefore you striving for the best every time. Also I will either take a role in the team or be the overall manage/ coach/ analyst

It will take time if players of different tiers are chosen team A and B will be created if alot of players are keen but no more than 10 players will be chosen.

replies.body: Also will be adding you guys when I come online tonight so be ready and please bump the post to find more possible teammates

Availability: Pretty much always after 7pm any day

Never been banned, never been muted I am a relaxed player who plays the game to have fun. I have played since season 1 and I am confident in my own abilities and decision making. I never surrender and believe its never over until a nexus explodes. As for my attitude towards their team and ours I live by this motto; "Never look down on someone, unless you're helping them up."

I never rage and very rarely use chat, except for giving team directions like 'prep drag 1 min' etc. I have some competitive Starcraft 2 experience and would love more than anything to be skilled enough to play league competitively.
